details:
noun
- doing or saying again
- (computer science) executing the same set of instructions a given number of times or until a specified result is obtained
= example: (computer science) executing the same set of instructions a given number of times or until a specified result is obtained
= synonyms: looping
- (computer science) a single execution of a set of instructions that are to be repeated
= example: (computer science) a single execution of a set of instructions that are to be repeated
= synonyms: loop
